description: Trek it up to higher terrain in our Hike Light Cushion Alpine Trail Print Crew Socks. Feel enhanced comfort of this hard-working sock, made with Indestructawool™ technology and a 4 Degree™ fit system designed to always stays put. Body-mapped mesh zones add breathability and a Virtually Seamless™ toe help keep both feet feeling cool and dry up in alpine territory.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Alpine Trail Print Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 57% Merino Wool, 12% Nylon, 27% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane, 1% Polyester
